name: Unforgiving Trials: The Space Crusade
description: The world is dying. Many years after the banishment of the evil that plagued the land, the world was hit by waves of unbearable heat. Now in order to save the world the band of young adventurers have set upon a quest to vanquish the Sun.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit) Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 600 MB available space Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display
